CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( Family , "/familyImage/product-family-icons/writing-supplies-icon.png", "Notebooks", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/notebook-icon.png", "Backpacks", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/backpack-icon.png", "Arts & Crafts", "/familyImage/product-family-iconsarts-and-crafts-icon.png", "Calculators", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/calculator-icon.png", "Accessories", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/accessories-icon.png", "Books", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/books-icon.png", "Calendars", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/calendar-icon.png", "Storage", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/storage-icon.png", "Sticky Notes", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/sticky-note-icon.png", "Electronics", "/familyImage/product-family-icons/electronics-icon.png") , "Product Category")
CustomField.label: Family Image
